infotexts.talentdescription.Talents_Magician_Prima: Increase ‖color:gui.green‖50%‖end‖ skill gain speed and ‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖ repair speed.
Gain +‖color:gui.green‖5‖end‖ to all skill levels. Unlock recipe: ‖color:gui.orange‖Mooncake‖end‖.
Movement speed in water +‖color:gui.green‖15%‖end‖ and damage taken –‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖.
Gain +‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖ XP from Nest, Hunt, Cargo, and Escort missions. If no one dies, gain an extra ‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖.

When refining element bottles with ‖color:gui.yellow‖Aether-Layer Metal or Astral-Layer Metal‖end‖, ‖color:gui.green‖15%‖end‖ chance to double output and ‖color:gui.green‖5%‖end‖ chance to gain an extra double output. After any mission with no deaths, gain one ‖color:gui.orange‖Aether-Layer Metal‖end‖.
Based on current magic ability, increase ‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖ movement speed and ranged firing speed, up to ‖color:gui.green‖20%‖end‖.
Physical damage to non-humans +‖color:gui.green‖15%‖end‖; damage to allies –‖color:gui.green‖30%‖end‖.

Reduce water-current impact ‖color:gui.green‖30%‖end‖; +‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖ ‖color:gui.orange‖max HP‖end‖. Unlock recipes: ‖color:gui.orange‖Exorcist Holy Flame‖end‖ and ‖color:gui.orange‖Purification Buckshot‖end‖.
infotexts.talentdescription.Gensokyo_Banquet: While under any ‖color:gui.orange‖cuisine‖end‖ effect, gain +‖color:gui.green‖15‖end‖ max HP. After each round, if no one dies, partially heal all ‖color:gui.yellow‖physical, burn, bleed, blood-loss, and Death’s Tax‖end‖ damage.
infotexts.talentdescription.Gensokyo_Hermit: +‖color:gui.green‖30%‖end‖ melee damage with magic weapons. When attacked, ‖color:gui.green‖25%‖end‖ chance to reduce damage taken by ‖color:gui.green‖40%‖end‖ (‖color:gui.green‖2‖end‖-second cooldown).
infotexts.talentdescription.Enter_Gensokyo: Gain ‖color:gui.green‖25%‖end‖ resistance to spiritual turbulence. When ‖color:gui.orange‖magic ability‖end‖ is >‖color:gui.green‖30‖end‖ but <‖color:gui.green‖70‖end‖, +‖color:gui.green‖5‖end‖ to all base skills; when >‖color:gui.green‖70‖end‖, +‖color:gui.green‖10‖end‖.
infotexts.talentdescription.Izakaya: Gain ‖color:gui.green‖50%‖end‖ resistance to drunkenness. While under any ‖color:gui.orange‖drink‖end‖ effect: +‖color:gui.green‖15%‖end‖ ‖color:gui.orange‖burn and bleed resistance‖end‖ and +‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖ bullet damage. Unlock recipes: ‖color:gui.orange‖Beer, Friendship Juice‖end‖.
infotexts.talentdescription.Gensokyo_Divinggear_Un: At round end, +‖color:gui.green‖1.5‖end‖ to all skills and magic ability; grant crew +‖color:gui.green‖0.5‖end‖. Provides extra effects for ‖color:gui.yellow‖Magician/Magical Girl Outfit+‖end‖. Unlock recipe: ‖color:gui.orange‖Fantasy Diving Suit‖end‖.
infotexts.talentdescription.Spell_Card_Recycle_Unl: Bottled element purchase price –‖color:gui.green‖75%‖end‖; +‖color:gui.green‖5%‖end‖ ‖color:gui.orange‖physical and burn resistance to both hands‖end‖. Unlock recipe: recycle ‖color:gui.orange‖Sun/Moon Spell Cards‖end‖.
infotexts.talentdescription.Magic_Breakthrough: Crafted item quality +‖color:gui.green‖1‖end‖. If wearing Patchouli+/Marisa+/Flandre+/Alice+/Emma+ outfits, quality +‖color:gui.green‖1‖end‖ more.
infotexts.talentdescription.Foul_Potion_Unlocked: Magic material crafting speed +‖color:gui.green‖50%‖end‖; poison effects +‖color:gui.green‖20%‖end‖. Unlock recipe: ‖color:gui.orange‖Foul Potion‖end‖.
infotexts.talentdescription.Hermes: +‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖ attack damage, max HP, and physical resistance. Unlock recipes: ‖color:gui.orange‖Philosopher’s Stone, P-Point (Red) (Efficient Synthesis)‖end‖.
infotexts.talentdescription.Traveling_Magician: If no one dies after a round, receive one ‖color:gui.orange‖“Magic Teaching” book‖end‖; crew members below level 7 gain XP ‖color:gui.orange‖20%‖end‖ faster.
infotexts.talentdescription.Mana_Release: Bonuses by level: ‖color:gui.green‖Lv5‖end‖: If magic ability >‖color:gui.green‖60‖end‖, each attack has ‖color:gui.green‖40%‖end‖ chance to deal +‖color:gui.green‖15%‖end‖ damage. ‖color:gui.green‖Lv10‖end‖: If magic ability >‖color:gui.green‖80‖end‖, ranged projectile damage +‖color:gui.green‖20%‖end‖. ‖color:gui.green‖Lv15‖end‖: If magic ability >‖color:gui.green‖120‖end‖, gain ‖color:gui.green‖300s‖end‖ immunity to water pressure; remaining time restores after returning to ‖color:gui.red‖dry environment‖end‖.
infotexts.talentdescription.Mana_Convergence: Bonuses by level: After ‖color:gui.green‖Lv5‖end‖: +‖color:gui.green‖3%‖end‖ ‖color:gui.orange‖skill gain speed‖end‖ and +‖color:gui.green‖1%‖end‖ ‖color:gui.orange‖XP gain‖end‖ per level up to Lv20. After ‖color:gui.green‖Lv10‖end‖: +‖color:gui.green‖2%‖end‖ ‖color:gui.orange‖swim speed‖end‖ and –‖color:gui.green‖1%‖end‖ ‖color:gui.orange‖dual-wield penalty‖end‖ per level up to Lv20. After ‖color:gui.green‖Lv15‖end‖: Each mission completed +‖color:gui.green‖2%‖end‖ ‖color:gui.orange‖max HP‖end‖ (max +‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖), resets on death.
infotexts.talentdescription.Power_Point_Efficient_: Accept one extra mission per round; reputation gain +‖color:gui.green‖25%‖end‖; can drag creatures at full speed.
infotexts.talentdescription.MEID_Unlocked: When crafting P-Point (Red) or other magic weapons, chance to not consume one material. Unlock recipe: ‖color:gui.orange‖MEID‖end‖.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Gensokyo_Divinggea: Reduce friendly fire by 15% and increase all five elemental damages by 15%.
Reduce friendly fire by 15%; slightly increases all skills, especially magic ability.
Reduce friendly fire by 15%; increase max HP by 10% based on magic skill, up to 30%.
Reduce friendly fire by 15%; when controlling dolls, gain 20% physical and burn resistance and are harder to detect.
Reduce friendly fire by 15%; increase skill levels by 50%.
infotexts.talentdescription.Talents_Yousei_Primary: After completing any mission in a voyage, gain an extra ‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖ experience and receive one ‖color:gui.orange‖Fairy Candy (Apple Flavor)‖end‖.
Increase ‖color:gui.orange‖skill gain speed‖end‖ by ‖color:gui.green‖50%‖end‖ and ‖color:gui.orange‖movement speed‖end‖ by ‖color:gui.green‖5%‖end‖.

Gain ‖color:gui.green‖5%‖end‖ ‖color:gui.orange‖movement speed‖end‖ and ‖color:gui.green‖25%‖end‖ resistance to ‖color:gui.orange‖oxygen deprivation‖end‖, and reduce friendly fire by ‖color:gui.green‖20%‖end‖.

Increase ‖color:gui.orange‖max HP‖end‖ by ‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖. When HP is above ‖color:gui.green‖50%‖end‖, increase ‖color:gui.orange‖repair speed‖end‖ by ‖color:gui.green‖25%‖end‖ and gain an extra ‖color:gui.orange‖Fairy Candy (Peach Flavor)‖end‖ after missions.
Increase swimming speed by ‖color:gui.green‖20%‖end‖ and experience gain by ‖color:gui.green‖15%‖end‖.

When the submarine is attacked, gain ‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖ ‖color:gui.orange‖physical resistance‖end‖ and ‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖ ‖color:gui.orange‖movement speed‖end‖ for ‖color:gui.green‖6‖end‖ seconds.

After each voyage mission, gain ‖color:gui.orange‖Fairy Candy (Lemon Flavor)‖end‖, increase ‖color:gui.orange‖physical resistance‖end‖ of both hands by ‖color:gui.green‖5%‖end‖, and unlock recipes: ‖color:gui.orange‖Sugar-Coated Shell, Candy Cannon‖end‖.

Each completed mission grants mutation energy, providing up to ‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖ ‖color:gui.orange‖attack speed‖end‖, ‖color:gui.orange‖attack damage‖end‖, and ‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖ ‖color:gui.orange‖burn resistance‖end‖. Unlock recipe: ‖color:gui.orange‖Mutant Candy‖end‖.

Take the average of two skill pairs and gain ‖color:gui.green‖8%‖end‖ of the corresponding bonus based on the average: ‖color:gui.yellow‖Helm + Weapons‖end‖: ‖color:gui.orange‖Max HP‖end‖ ‖color:gui.yellow‖Mechanical + Electrical‖end‖: ‖color:gui.orange‖Repair Speed‖end‖ ‖color:gui.yellow‖Medical + Magic‖end‖: ‖color:gui.orange‖Attack Damage‖end‖ Up to 20%.
infotexts.talentdescription.Touhou_Candy_Fun: After completing any mission, gain ‖color:gui.orange‖Fairy Candy (Yuzu Flavor)‖end‖. Using different candies in the medical menu grants various buffs for ‖color:gui.green‖150‖end‖ seconds: ‖color:gui.yellow‖Apple Flavor‖end‖: ‖color:gui.orange‖Haste‖end‖ +‖color:gui.green‖150 points‖end‖ ‖color:gui.yellow‖Peach Flavor‖end‖: Increase ‖color:gui.orange‖Max HP‖end‖ by ‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖ ‖color:gui.yellow‖Lemon Flavor‖end‖: Increase ‖color:gui.orange‖Attack Speed‖end‖ by ‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖ ‖color:gui.yellow‖Yuzu Flavor‖end‖: Increase ‖color:gui.orange‖Attack Damage‖end‖ by ‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖.
infotexts.talentdescription.Touhou_Insouciance: If no hostile creatures are nearby, accelerate recovery of ‖color:gui.yellow‖physical damage, burns, and bleeding‖end‖.
infotexts.talentdescription.Touhou_Emergency_Avoid: If more than ‖color:gui.green‖3‖end‖ hostile creatures are nearby and HP is below ‖color:gui.green‖50%‖end‖, increase ‖color:gui.orange‖movement speed‖end‖ by ‖color:gui.green‖15%‖end‖ and ‖color:gui.orange‖stun resistance‖end‖ by ‖color:gui.green‖15%‖end‖.
infotexts.talentdescription.Touhou_Lone_Yousei: If no other crew are nearby, your medical item effectiveness increases by ‖color:gui.green‖20%‖end‖ and resistance to ‖color:gui.yellow‖debuffs‖end‖ increases by ‖color:gui.green‖20%‖end‖.
infotexts.talentdescription.Touhou_Candy_World: Increase crafted item quality by ‖color:gui.green‖1‖end‖. After each voyage mission, gain one of each of the four candies. Unlock recipes: ‖color:gui.orange‖Candy Cannon Plus, Sugar-Coated Shell, Super Candy‖end‖.
infotexts.talentdescription.Touhou_Yousei_Alliance: When wearing the ‖color:gui.orange‖Fairy Outfit+‖end‖, increase its effect by ‖color:gui.green‖50%‖end‖.
infotexts.talentdescription.Behind_The_Mutation: Each creature kill has a ‖color:gui.green‖50%‖end‖ chance to grant ‖color:gui.green‖2‖end‖ mutation energy. Above ‖color:gui.green‖10‖end‖ energy: +‖color:gui.green‖50%‖end‖ ‖color:gui.orange‖skill gain speed‖end‖. Above ‖color:gui.green‖20‖end‖ energy: +‖color:gui.green‖20%‖end‖ ‖color:gui.orange‖burn resistance‖end‖.
infotexts.talentdescription.Touhou_Cute_Prank: Each creature kill has a ‖color:gui.green‖50%‖end‖ chance to gain ‖color:gui.green‖2‖end‖ mutation energy. Above ‖color:gui.green‖30‖end‖ energy: +‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖ max HP and +‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖ turret fire rate.
infotexts.talentdescription.Eastern_And_Little_Nat: Above ‖color:gui.green‖40‖end‖ mutation energy: +‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖ ‖color:gui.orange‖attack damage‖end‖, +‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖ ‖color:gui.orange‖physical resistance‖end‖, and +‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖ ‖color:gui.orange‖skill levels‖end‖. Unlock recipes: ‖color:gui.orange‖Blade of the Ice Hero, Hell Torch, Triple Fairy Ballista‖end‖.
infotexts.talentdescription.Touhou_Magical_Assista: If a magician is on board, increase their ‖color:gui.orange‖skill gain speed‖end‖ by ‖color:gui.green‖25%‖end‖ and your own ‖color:gui.orange‖skill levels‖end‖ by ‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖.
infotexts.talentdescription.Touhou_Self_Made: After each voyage mission, gain one ‖color:gui.orange‖Aetherlayer Metal‖end‖. If no one dies, also gain ‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖ extra experience.
infotexts.talentdescription.Quiet_And_Well_Behaved: Increase ‖color:gui.orange‖repair speed‖end‖ by ‖color:gui.green‖15%‖end‖ and ‖color:gui.orange‖max HP‖end‖ by ‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖; also benefits onboard magicians.
infotexts.talentdescription.Touhou_Vibrant: When in the same room as a magician, you will not die from injuries.
infotexts.talentdescription.Touhou_Further_Study: Increase Fabricator/Deconstructor speed by ‖color:gui.green‖50%‖end‖ and drug crafting speed by ‖color:gui.green‖50%‖end‖.
infotexts.talentdescription.Touhou_Child_Of_Nature: Gain one of each candy per voyage. Above ‖color:gui.green‖60‖end‖ mutation energy, gain the ‖color:gui.yellow‖Mana Release‖end‖ effect. Unlock recipe: ‖color:gui.orange‖Candy Essence‖end‖. Candy Essence allows the Fairy class to gain weaker versions of five Magician talents (including three ultimate talents). Unlocking all five grants extra bonuses: +‖color:gui.green‖1‖end‖ item quality and ‖color:gui.green‖90%‖end‖ slower mutation energy decay.
infotexts.talentdescription.Gensokyo_Divinggear_Un: Gain ‖color:gui.green‖1‖end‖ point to all skills and magic at the end of each voyage.
infotexts.talentdescription.Gensokyo_Banquet_Youse: After each voyage, if no one dies, restore part of everyone’s ‖color:gui.yellow‖physical damage, burns, bleeding, blood loss, and Death’s Tax‖end‖.
infotexts.talentname.Talents_Magician_Primary03_Yo: Who Can’t Fly? – Child of Nature
infotexts.talentdescription.Talents_Magician_Prima: Increase underwater movement speed by ‖color:gui.green‖5%‖end‖ and reduce physical damage taken by 5%.
infotexts.talentdescription.Talents_Yokai_Primary0: Increase ‖color:gui.green‖15%‖end‖ skill gain speed, doubled when HP is above ‖color:gui.green‖60%‖end‖.

Earn ‖color:gui.green‖5%‖end‖ more money from missions; if ‖color:gui.red‖no one dies‖end‖ in the voyage, gain an additional ‖color:gui.green‖300‖end‖ MK. At level ‖color:gui.green‖8‖end‖ or higher, gain another ‖color:gui.green‖300‖end‖ MK.
Increase ‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖ ‖color:gui.orange‖repair speed‖end‖ and ‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖ ‖color:gui.orange‖hull repair speed‖end‖. Doubled after level ‖color:gui.green‖8‖end‖.
Reduce ‖color:gui.orange‖max HP‖end‖ by ‖color:gui.green‖5%‖end‖ and increase damage to humans by ‖color:gui.green‖5%‖end‖.
Reduce ‖color:gui.orange‖max HP‖end‖ by ‖color:gui.green‖5%‖end‖ and increase damage to non-humans by ‖color:gui.green‖5%‖end‖.
Reduce ‖color:gui.orange‖max HP‖end‖ by ‖color:gui.green‖5%‖end‖ and reduce friendly fire damage by ‖color:gui.green‖20%‖end‖.

Reduce ‖color:gui.orange‖max HP‖end‖ by ‖color:gui.green‖5%‖end‖ and increase all types of damage (including ‖color:gui.orange‖explosion‖end‖ and ‖color:gui.orange‖turret‖end‖) by ‖color:gui.green‖5%‖end‖.
Increase ‖color:gui.orange‖swimming speed‖end‖ by ‖color:gui.green‖15%‖end‖ and gain an additional ‖color:gui.green‖20%‖end‖ in ‖color:gui.yellow‖open seas‖end‖.
infotexts.talentdescription.Talents_Yokai_Primary1: Increase ‖color:gui.orange‖walking speed‖end‖ by ‖color:gui.green‖5%‖end‖, doubled after level ‖color:gui.green‖10‖end‖.
Increase all ‖color:gui.orange‖skill levels‖end‖ by ‖color:gui.green‖5%‖end‖ and reduce the impact of water currents by ‖color:gui.green‖20%‖end‖.

If you have the lowest level among crew, increase ‖color:gui.orange‖skill gain speed‖end‖ by ‖color:gui.green‖50%‖end‖ and ‖color:gui.orange‖experience gain speed‖end‖ by ‖color:gui.green‖15%‖end‖. If level is at least ‖color:gui.green‖12‖end‖, grant all crew ‖color:gui.orange‖skill gain speed‖end‖ +‖color:gui.green‖50%‖end‖ and ‖color:gui.yellow‖burn resistance‖end‖ +‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖.
After completing ‖color:gui.red‖all missions‖end‖ in a voyage, gain ‖color:gui.green‖1‖end‖ blood bag. If any crew dies, gain an additional ‖color:gui.green‖1‖end‖ blood bag.
Increase crafted item quality by ‖color:gui.green‖1‖end‖. Unlock recipe: ‖color:gui.orange‖Life Pointer‖end‖. Using the Life Pointer on dead enemies allows collection of ‖color:gui.red‖Fear‖end‖.

Each creature killed adds ‖color:gui.green‖1‖end‖ count. Reaching certain counts grants effects: ‖color:gui.green‖160‖end‖: +‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖ ‖color:gui.orange‖max HP‖end‖ and +‖color:gui.green‖5%‖end‖ ‖color:gui.orange‖physical resistance (hands)‖end‖. ‖color:gui.green‖320‖end‖: Slightly accelerate recovery of ‖color:gui.yellow‖physical damage and bleeding‖end‖; can drag creatures at full speed when a crew member is unconscious. ‖color:gui.green‖480‖end‖: +‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖ ‖color:gui.orange‖attack damage‖end‖.

Based on ‖color:gui.green‖5%‖end‖ of current ‖color:gui.orange‖skill levels‖end‖, gain effects up to ‖color:gui.green‖15%‖end‖: ‖color:gui.yellow‖Helm‖end‖: ‖color:gui.orange‖movement speed‖end‖ ‖color:gui.yellow‖Weapons‖end‖: ‖color:gui.orange‖melee damage‖end‖ ‖color:gui.yellow‖Medical‖end‖: ‖color:gui.orange‖buff duration‖end‖ ‖color:gui.yellow‖Electrical‖end‖: ‖color:gui.orange‖ranged attack speed‖end‖ ‖color:gui.yellow‖Mechanical‖end‖: ‖color:gui.orange‖melee attack speed‖end‖ ‖color:gui.yellow‖Magic‖end‖: ‖color:gui.orange‖max HP‖end‖.
infotexts.talentdescription.Yokai_Select_Youling_W: After selecting this branch, no others can be unlocked. Character: ‖color:gui.orange‖Youmu Konpaku‖end‖.
infotexts.talentdescription.Yokai_Select_Yaoguai: After selecting this branch, no others can be unlocked. Characters: ‖color:gui.orange‖Yuuka Kazami, Houjuu Nue, Nitori Kawashiro, Koishi Komeiji, Yukari Yakumo‖end‖.
infotexts.talentdescription.Yokai_Select_Vampire: After selecting this branch, no others can be unlocked. Characters: ‖color:gui.orange‖Remilia Scarlet, Flandre Scarlet‖end‖.
infotexts.talentdescription.Yokai_Select_Yaoshou: After selecting this branch, no others can be unlocked. Characters: ‖color:gui.orange‖Aun Komano, Reisen Udongein Inaba‖end‖.
infotexts.talentdescription.Yokai_Select_Tiangou: After selecting this branch, no others can be unlocked. Characters: ‖color:gui.orange‖Aya Shameimaru, Momiji Inubashiri‖end‖.
infotexts.talentdescription.Yokai_Select_Tianren_X: After selecting this branch, no others can be unlocked. Character: ‖color:gui.orange‖Tenshi Hinanawi‖end‖.
infotexts.talentdescription.Yokai_Select_ShenMing: After selecting this branch, no others can be unlocked. Character: ‖color:gui.orange‖Hata no Kokoro‖end‖.
infotexts.talentdescription.Touhou_Yokai_Talents_L: Increase ‖color:gui.orange‖max HP‖end‖ by ‖color:gui.green‖5%‖end‖. Final talent of the branch: after unlocking this talent, ‖color:gui.red‖other branches cannot be unlocked‖end‖. If Source of Mutation count is not full, immediately gain ‖color:gui.green‖100‖end‖ count.
infotexts.talentdescription.Touhou_Youling_Wanglin: Monsters’ ‖color:gui.orange‖detection range‖end‖ is slightly reduced, and ‖color:gui.orange‖physical damage resistance‖end‖ increases by ‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖. When attacked, inflicts a small amount of ‖color:gui.yellow‖Freeze and Psychosis‖end‖ on the attacker; 3-second cooldown.
Deals more bonus damage to ‖color:gui.red‖weaker‖end‖ enemies, up to ‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖.

The higher the enemy’s ‖color:gui.red‖remaining HP‖end‖, the greater your armor penetration, up to ‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖. Wearing ‖color:gui.red‖Youmu Outfit+‖end‖: Attacks on ‖color:gui.red‖full-HP enemies‖end‖ deal an extra ‖color:gui.green‖30%‖end‖ damage and ‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖ armor penetration. Attacking enemies affected by ‖color:gui.orange‖断念‖end‖ also inflicts ‖color:gui.orange‖Slow‖end‖.

When HP is below ‖color:gui.green‖30%‖end‖, briefly gain ‖color:gui.green‖20%‖end‖ ‖color:gui.orange‖physical‖end‖ and ‖color:gui.orange‖burn resistance‖end‖. Wearing ‖color:gui.red‖Youmu Outfit+‖end‖: +‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖ ‖color:gui.orange‖max HP‖end‖ and +‖color:gui.green‖20‖end‖ ‖color:gui.orange‖Weapons skill‖end‖.

When you kill any creature, briefly increase your ‖color:gui.orange‖stun resistance‖end‖. Wearing ‖color:gui.red‖Youmu Outfit+‖end‖: Also briefly increase ‖color:gui.orange‖debuff resistance‖end‖ after a kill.

Increase all other skill levels by ‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖ of your ‖color:gui.orange‖Magic‖end‖ level, up to ‖color:gui.green‖30%‖end‖. Wearing ‖color:gui.red‖Youmu Outfit+‖end‖: +‖color:gui.green‖20%‖end‖ ‖color:gui.orange‖melee damage‖end‖; gain up to ‖color:gui.green‖20%‖end‖ ‖color:gui.orange‖max HP‖end‖ based on ‖color:gui.orange‖Weapons skill‖end‖.

Wearing ‖color:gui.red‖Youmu Outfit+‖end‖: Once per campaign, if HP falls below ‖color:gui.green‖0‖end‖ you remain conscious for ‖color:gui.green‖10‖end‖ seconds and gain +‖color:gui.green‖50%‖end‖ ‖color:gui.orange‖skill levels‖end‖. Killing any creature within those 10 s extends the duration by ‖color:gui.green‖1‖end‖ second.
infotexts.talentdescription.Touhou_Yaoguai01: ‖color:gui.green‖25%‖end‖ more effective healing from medicine. After not taking damage for a while, gain +‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖ ‖color:gui.orange‖movement speed‖end‖ and reduce damage taken by ‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖ until hit.
infotexts.talentdescription.Touhou_Yaoguai02: Deal +‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖ damage to human targets; crouching makes you harder to detect.
infotexts.talentdescription.Touhou_Yaoguai03: Gain +‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖ ‖color:gui.orange‖physical and burn resistance‖end‖; being hit slightly raises your ‖color:gui.orange‖Psychosis‖end‖. Higher ‖color:gui.orange‖Psychosis‖end‖ lowers this resistance, minimum ‖color:gui.green‖3%‖end‖.
infotexts.talentdescription.Touhou_Yaoguai04: If no other crew are nearby, gain +‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖ ‖color:gui.orange‖movement speed, attack damage, and debuff resistance‖end‖. Unlock recipe: ‖color:gui.orange‖Moonquake, Moonquake Core‖end‖. Holding ‖color:gui.orange‖Moonquake‖end‖ as a Yokai also triggers outfit weapon effects for this branch.
infotexts.talentdescription.Touhou_Yaoguai05: With ‖color:gui.yellow‖Parasite Resistance‖end‖, you are immune to water pressure. Wearing ‖color:gui.red‖Yuuka Outfit+‖end‖: +‖color:gui.green‖15%‖end‖ ‖color:gui.orange‖max HP‖end‖; weak creatures avoid you. Wearing ‖color:gui.red‖Nue Outfit+‖end‖: Attacks inflict ‖color:gui.yellow‖Endless Nightmare‖end‖; killing a target causes an explosion spreading the effect. Wearing ‖color:gui.red‖Nitori Outfit+‖end‖: Heal wounds faster in water and gain +‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖ ‖color:gui.orange‖bleed and burn resistance‖end‖ underwater. Wearing ‖color:gui.red‖Koishi Outfit+‖end‖: +‖color:gui.green‖15%‖end‖ ‖color:gui.orange‖movement speed‖end‖; if not ‖color:gui.yellow‖unconscious‖end‖, gain +‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖ ‖color:gui.orange‖physical resistance‖end‖. Wearing ‖color:gui.red‖Yukari Outfit+‖end‖: Gain permanent ‖color:gui.green‖50% (300/600)‖end‖ ‖color:gui.yellow‖Haste‖end‖; each hit has ‖color:gui.green‖25%‖end‖ chance to reduce damage taken by ‖color:gui.green‖25%‖end‖.
infotexts.talentdescription.Touhou_Yaoguai06: Slowly heals your ‖color:gui.orange‖Psychosis‖end‖. After running for a time, slightly increases next attack damage (15 s cooldown). Wearing ‖color:gui.red‖Yuuka Outfit+‖end‖: Greatly amplifies each petal effect. Wearing ‖color:gui.red‖Nue Outfit+‖end‖: After completing four count stages, +‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖ ‖color:gui.orange‖attack speed‖end‖; immune to ‖color:gui.orange‖Endless Nightmare and Ancient Dread‖end‖; item quality +‖color:gui.green‖1‖end‖. Wearing ‖color:gui.red‖Nitori Outfit+‖end‖: +‖color:gui.green‖30%‖end‖ ‖color:gui.orange‖repair and hull repair speed‖end‖; if HP > 50%, +‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖ ‖color:gui.orange‖physical resistance‖end‖, else +‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖ ‖color:gui.orange‖attack damage‖end‖. Wearing ‖color:gui.red‖Koishi Outfit+‖end‖: +‖color:gui.green‖15%‖end‖ ‖color:gui.orange‖skill levels‖end‖; immune to ‖color:gui.orange‖water flow push‖end‖; +‖color:gui.green‖30%‖end‖ ‖color:gui.orange‖swim speed‖end‖. Wearing ‖color:gui.red‖Yukari Outfit+‖end‖: +‖color:gui.green‖50%‖end‖ ‖color:gui.orange‖swim speed‖end‖; if no crew deaths this campaign, gain +‖color:gui.green‖15%‖end‖ ‖color:gui.orange‖attack damage‖end‖ for one campaign.
infotexts.talentdescription.Touhou_Yaoguai07: Wearing ‖color:gui.red‖Yuuka Outfit+‖end‖: Greatly speeds ‖color:gui.yellow‖bleed‖end‖ recovery; based on ‖color:gui.orange‖Magic‖end‖ level, +‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖ attack damage, ‖color:gui.orange‖melee speed, movement speed‖end‖, up to ‖color:gui.green‖20%‖end‖. Wearing ‖color:gui.red‖Nue Outfit+‖end‖: If ‖color:gui.orange‖Magic‖end‖ > ‖color:gui.green‖80‖end‖, +‖color:gui.green‖20%‖end‖ ‖color:gui.orange‖max HP‖end‖; +‖color:gui.green‖20%‖end‖ damage to enemies below half HP. Wearing ‖color:gui.red‖Nitori Outfit+‖end‖: –‖color:gui.green‖20%‖end‖ ‖color:gui.orange‖reactor fuel use‖end‖; if ‖color:gui.orange‖Mechanical‖end‖ > ‖color:gui.green‖80‖end‖, +‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖ ‖color:gui.orange‖turret damage‖end‖, –‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖ turret power, +‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖ reactor max output & pump efficiency. Wearing ‖color:gui.red‖Koishi Outfit+‖end‖: +‖color:gui.green‖15%‖end‖ ‖color:gui.orange‖melee speed‖end‖ based on ‖color:gui.orange‖Magic‖end‖, up to ‖color:gui.green‖40%‖end‖; +‖color:gui.green‖25.7%‖end‖ damage to enemies above ‖color:gui.green‖90%‖end‖ HP. Wearing ‖color:gui.red‖Yukari Outfit+‖end‖: If no damage for ‖color:gui.green‖120‖end‖ s and HP > ‖color:gui.green‖90%‖end‖, enter ‖color:gui.yellow‖Stealth‖end‖ reducing detection. Unlock recipe: ‖color:gui.orange‖Dual-Aspect Key‖end‖.
infotexts.talentdescription.Touhou_Vampire01: ‖color:gui.orange‖Skill levels‖end‖ +‖color:gui.green‖15%‖end‖; using ‖color:gui.orange‖Blood Bag/Quality Type-B Blood‖end‖ additionally heals ‖color:gui.yellow‖bleeding‖end‖.
infotexts.talentdescription.Touhou_Vampire02: +‖color:gui.green‖15%‖end‖ ‖color:gui.orange‖blood-loss resistance‖end‖; received ‖color:gui.yellow‖burn and bleed‖end‖ +‖color:gui.red‖15%‖end‖. Each second has ‖color:gui.green‖20%‖end‖ chance to convert ‖color:gui.yellow‖burn‖end‖ into ‖color:gui.yellow‖bite‖end‖ damage at 120% rate. Reduces ‖color:gui.orange‖debuff duration‖end‖ by ‖color:gui.green‖0.5%‖end‖ per ‖color:gui.red‖character level‖end‖, max ‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖.
infotexts.talentdescription.Touhou_Vampire03: ‖color:gui.yellow‖Bleeding‖end‖ inflicted +‖color:gui.green‖15%‖end‖. Bleed and blood-loss vs humans +‖color:gui.green‖15%‖end‖. Damage scales up to +‖color:gui.green‖20%‖end‖ with target’s ‖color:gui.yellow‖bleeding‖end‖ level.
infotexts.talentdescription.Touhou_Vampire04: ‖color:gui.orange‖Attack speed‖end‖ +‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖ (halved in water). Wearing ‖color:gui.red‖Remilia Outfit+‖end‖: +‖color:gui.green‖5%‖end‖ ‖color:gui.orange‖physical resistance‖end‖, +‖color:gui.green‖5%‖end‖ ‖color:gui.orange‖burn resistance‖end‖, +‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖ ‖color:gui.orange‖max HP‖end‖. Wearing ‖color:gui.red‖Flandre Outfit+‖end‖: +‖color:gui.green‖15%‖end‖ ‖color:gui.orange‖burn resistance‖end‖; if HP > ‖color:gui.green‖50%‖end‖, +‖color:gui.green‖50%‖end‖ ‖color:gui.orange‖psychosis resistance‖end‖ and +‖color:gui.green‖50%‖end‖ skill gain rate.
infotexts.talentdescription.Touhou_Vampire05: +‖color:gui.green‖15%‖end‖ ‖color:gui.orange‖debuff and poison resistance‖end‖. Wearing ‖color:gui.red‖Remilia Outfit+‖end‖: Immune to normal ‖color:gui.orange‖alien infections‖end‖ including ‖color:gui.red‖Painted Skin Symbiont‖end‖; if HP less than ‖color:gui.green‖50%‖end‖, temporarily +‖color:gui.green‖30%‖end‖ ‖color:gui.orange‖attack damage‖end‖. Wearing ‖color:gui.red‖Flandre Outfit+‖end‖: Greatly accelerates ‖color:gui.yellow‖bite‖end‖ recovery; if ‖color:gui.orange‖Magic‖end‖ > ‖color:gui.green‖100‖end‖, +‖color:gui.green‖25‖end‖ ‖color:gui.orange‖medical skill‖end‖; increases ‖color:gui.orange‖max HP‖end‖ by ‖color:gui.green‖20%‖end‖ of Magic (max ‖color:gui.green‖40%‖end‖).
infotexts.talentdescription.Touhou_Vampire06: Immune to ‖color:gui.yellow‖wound infection‖end‖; killing any creature has ‖color:gui.green‖50%‖end‖ chance to heal your ‖color:gui.yellow‖bites and burns‖end‖. Wearing ‖color:gui.red‖Remilia Outfit+‖end‖: After using ‖color:gui.orange‖Quality Type-B Blood‖end‖, bleed damage +‖color:gui.green‖66.6%‖end‖. Wearing ‖color:gui.red‖Flandre Outfit+‖end‖: +‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖ ‖color:gui.orange‖physical resistance‖end‖; item quality +‖color:gui.green‖1‖end‖; also gain Quality Type-B Blood bonuses: ‖color:gui.orange‖Haste, Slow Metabolism, Revitalization‖end‖.
infotexts.talentdescription.Touhou_Vampire07: Wearing ‖color:gui.red‖Remilia Outfit+‖end‖: +‖color:gui.green‖1%‖end‖ ‖color:gui.orange‖attack damage‖end‖ per ‖color:gui.orange‖level‖end‖, up to ‖color:gui.green‖20%‖end‖; greatly increases single-heal from ‖color:gui.orange‖Quality Type-B Blood‖end‖; if HP falls below ‖color:gui.green‖0‖end‖, you remain alive for ‖color:gui.green‖20‖end‖ s (once per campaign). Wearing ‖color:gui.red‖Flandre Outfit+‖end‖: Deals +‖color:gui.green‖20%‖end‖ extra ‖color:gui.yellow‖burn, laceration, and internal damage‖end‖ to enemies with HP above ‖color:gui.green‖49.5%‖end‖; if HP less than ‖color:gui.green‖0‖end‖, remain conscious for ‖color:gui.green‖10‖end‖ s (once per campaign).
infotexts.talentdescription.Touhou_Yaoshou_Shouren: When other crew members are nearby, greatly increases recovery speed of ‖color:gui.yellow‖bleeding and blood loss‖end‖.
Increase ‖color:gui.green‖5%‖end‖ ‖color:gui.orange‖physical resistance‖end‖ and ‖color:gui.green‖15%‖end‖ ‖color:gui.orange‖bite resistance‖end‖. Bite damage dealt +‖color:gui.green‖20%‖end‖.
Becomes protected by small monsters. Above ‖color:gui.green‖level 15‖end‖, ‖color:gui.orange‖skill levels‖end‖ +‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖.

Melee attacks inflict minor ‖color:gui.yellow‖bite‖end‖ damage. Deals +‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖ damage to enemies with HP below ‖color:gui.green‖50%‖end‖. Wearing ‖color:gui.red‖Aunn Outfit+‖end‖: +‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖ ‖color:gui.orange‖max HP‖end‖; increases effect of ‖color:gui.yellow‖“Lion”‖end‖ by ‖color:gui.green‖50%‖end‖. Wearing ‖color:gui.red‖Reisen Outfit+‖end‖: +‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖ ‖color:gui.orange‖max HP‖end‖; while running, damage taken –‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖.

+‖color:gui.green‖50%‖end‖ ‖color:gui.orange‖psychosis resistance‖end‖; greatly accelerates recovery from ‖color:gui.yellow‖hallucinations‖end‖. Wearing ‖color:gui.red‖Aunn Outfit+‖end‖: Gain +‖color:gui.green‖0.5‖end‖ skill points whenever earning skill points; nearby crew gain +‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖ ‖color:gui.orange‖movement speed‖end‖ and +‖color:gui.green‖50%‖end‖ ‖color:gui.orange‖skill gain speed‖end‖. Wearing ‖color:gui.red‖Reisen Outfit+‖end‖: +‖color:gui.green‖50%‖end‖ ‖color:gui.orange‖skill gain speed‖end‖ and +‖color:gui.green‖15%‖end‖ ‖color:gui.orange‖XP gain‖end‖; +‖color:gui.green‖20%‖end‖ ‖color:gui.yellow‖stun resistance‖end‖.

Increase ‖color:gui.orange‖max HP‖end‖ by ‖color:gui.green‖0.5%‖end‖ per ‖color:gui.orange‖level‖end‖ (max ‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖). Wearing ‖color:gui.red‖Aunn Outfit+‖end‖: +‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖ damage vs humans. Additional effects by level: ‖color:gui.green‖15‖end‖: Drag creatures at full speed. ‖color:gui.green‖20‖end‖: +‖color:gui.green‖50%‖end‖ ‖color:gui.orange‖oxygen deprivation resistance‖end‖. ‖color:gui.green‖25‖end‖: When unconscious, monsters won’t target you. Wearing ‖color:gui.red‖Reisen Outfit+‖end‖: +‖color:gui.green‖5%‖end‖ ‖color:gui.orange‖ranged damage‖end‖, +‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖ ranged projectile damage, and +‖color:gui.green‖5%‖end‖ ‖color:gui.yellow‖gunshot‖end‖ damage.

Wearing ‖color:gui.red‖Aunn Outfit+‖end‖: As long as other crew survive nearby, damage taken –‖color:gui.green‖20%‖end‖. Wearing ‖color:gui.red‖Reisen Outfit+‖end‖: If HP > ‖color:gui.green‖50%‖end‖, damage dealt +‖color:gui.green‖15%‖end‖; if HP less than ‖color:gui.green‖50%‖end‖, +‖color:gui.green‖15%‖end‖ ‖color:gui.yellow‖physical and burn resistance‖end‖.
infotexts.talentdescription.Touhou_Tiangou01: Converts drunken negative effects into positives: reduce damage taken by ‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖. Unlock recipe: ‖color:gui.orange‖Tengu Dance‖end‖.
infotexts.talentdescription.Touhou_Tiangou02: Damage to allies –‖color:gui.green‖15%‖end‖. When a crew member falls unconscious, nearby crew gain +‖color:gui.green‖20%‖end‖ ‖color:gui.orange‖debuff resistance‖end‖; your medical item effectiveness +‖color:gui.green‖15%‖end‖.
infotexts.talentdescription.Touhou_Tiangou04: Reputation gain +‖color:gui.green‖15%‖end‖, reputation loss –‖color:gui.green‖25%‖end‖. Level-up bonuses: ‖color:gui.green‖15‖end‖: ‖color:gui.orange‖Skill gain speed‖end‖ +‖color:gui.green‖50%‖end‖ ‖color:gui.green‖18‖end‖: ‖color:gui.orange‖Attack speed‖end‖ +‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖ ‖color:gui.green‖20‖end‖: ‖color:gui.orange‖Swimming speed‖end‖ +‖color:gui.green‖30%‖end‖ ‖color:gui.green‖22‖end‖: Mission reward money +‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖ ‖color:gui.green‖25‖end‖: Each time you’re hit, ‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖ chance to reduce damage taken by ‖color:gui.green‖25%‖end‖.
infotexts.talentdescription.Touhou_Tiangou05: If your level is lower than the highest crew member by ‖color:gui.green‖1‖end‖ or more, +‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖ ‖color:gui.orange‖attack damage‖end‖; otherwise +‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖ ‖color:gui.orange‖physical and burn resistance‖end‖. Unlock recipe: ‖color:gui.orange‖Tengu Token‖end‖. Wearing ‖color:gui.red‖Aya Outfit+‖end‖: +‖color:gui.green‖30%‖end‖ ‖color:gui.orange‖swimming speed‖end‖. Each new station entered adds ‖color:gui.green‖1‖end‖ count; at ‖color:gui.green‖5‖end‖ counts gain +‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖ ‖color:gui.orange‖attack damage, movement speed, and stun resistance‖end‖. Count resets on death. Wearing ‖color:gui.red‖Momiji Outfit+‖end‖: Based on ‖color:gui.orange‖weapon skill‖end‖, gain up to ‖color:gui.green‖15%‖end‖ ‖color:gui.orange‖swimming speed and buff duration‖end‖ (max ‖color:gui.green‖30%‖end‖).
infotexts.talentdescription.Touhou_Tiangou06: When your submarine is attacked, ‖color:gui.orange‖turret firing speed‖end‖ +‖color:gui.green‖25%‖end‖ for a short time (‖color:gui.green‖2‖end‖ min cooldown). Wearing ‖color:gui.red‖Aya Outfit+‖end‖: With nearby crew, +‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖ ‖color:gui.orange‖max HP‖end‖ and ‖color:gui.orange‖attack speed‖end‖. Wearing ‖color:gui.red‖Momiji Outfit+‖end‖: With nearby crew, deal +‖color:gui.green‖20%‖end‖ damage to enemies with HP below ‖color:gui.green‖50%‖end‖.
infotexts.talentdescription.Touhou_Tiangou07: Wearing ‖color:gui.red‖Aya Outfit+‖end‖: +‖color:gui.green‖1%‖end‖ ‖color:gui.orange‖movement speed‖end‖ per level (max ‖color:gui.green‖25%‖end‖); at ‖color:gui.green‖20‖end‖+ levels, +‖color:gui.green‖15%‖end‖ ‖color:gui.orange‖damage dealt‖end‖. Wearing ‖color:gui.red‖Momiji Outfit+‖end‖: +‖color:gui.green‖2%‖end‖ ‖color:gui.orange‖melee damage‖end‖ per level (max ‖color:gui.green‖50%‖end‖); at ‖color:gui.green‖20‖end‖+ levels, damage taken –‖color:gui.green‖15%‖end‖.
infotexts.talentdescription.Touhou_Tianren_Xianren: Increase ‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖ ‖color:gui.orange‖stun resistance‖end‖. If level is below ‖color:gui.green‖15‖end‖, ‖color:gui.orange‖skill gain speed‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖-50%‖end‖; otherwise ‖color:gui.orange‖skill gain speed‖end‖ ‖color:gui.red‖-150%‖end‖.

Increase ‖color:gui.green‖20%‖end‖ ‖color:gui.orange‖poison resistance‖end‖ and ‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖ ‖color:gui.orange‖debuff resistance‖end‖. If you are ‖color:gui.green‖2‖end‖ or more levels below the highest-level crew member, +‖color:gui.green‖20%‖end‖ ‖color:gui.orange‖skill gain speed‖end‖; otherwise +‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖ ‖color:gui.orange‖skill level‖end‖ and +‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖ ‖color:gui.orange‖max HP‖end‖.

After being attacked, inflict an 8-second debuff on the attacker: ‖color:gui.green‖-20%‖end‖ ‖color:gui.orange‖movement and attack speed‖end‖, and ‖color:gui.green‖-20%‖end‖ ‖color:gui.orange‖burn resistance‖end‖. Cooldown: ‖color:gui.green‖15‖end‖ seconds.

At full health, +‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖ ‖color:gui.orange‖movement speed‖end‖. When HP ≤ ‖color:gui.green‖0‖end‖, +‖color:gui.green‖90%‖end‖ ‖color:gui.orange‖oxygen deprivation resistance‖end‖. Above ‖color:gui.green‖level 15‖end‖, damage taken –‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖.

After killing any creature, grant +‖color:gui.green‖1‖end‖ point to all skills (max ‖color:gui.green‖3‖end‖ times per round). Wearing ‖color:gui.red‖Tenshi Outfit+‖end‖: After completing all missions in a round, gain ‖color:gui.green‖1‖end‖ count. At ‖color:gui.green‖10‖end‖ counts: +‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖ ‖color:gui.orange‖melee attack speed‖end‖ and ‖color:gui.orange‖physical resistance‖end‖. Counts reset on death.

Allows ‖color:gui.orange‖skill level‖end‖ cap to exceed ‖color:gui.green‖100‖end‖ up to ‖color:gui.green‖200‖end‖, but ‖color:gui.orange‖repair speed‖end‖ –‖color:gui.red‖70%‖end‖. Wearing ‖color:gui.red‖Tenshi Outfit+‖end‖: +‖color:gui.green‖1%‖end‖ ‖color:gui.orange‖attack speed‖end‖ per level (max ‖color:gui.green‖20%‖end‖).

Wearing ‖color:gui.red‖Tenshi Outfit+‖end‖: +‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖ ‖color:gui.orange‖attack damage‖end‖. Based on ‖color:gui.orange‖magic ability‖end‖, increase ‖color:gui.orange‖max HP‖end‖ by ‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖ per 10% of magic ability, up to ‖color:gui.green‖20%‖end‖.
infotexts.talentdescription.Touhou_ShenMing01: ‖color:gui.orange‖Physical damage resistance‖end‖ −‖color:gui.red‖10%‖end‖, +‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖ ‖color:gui.orange‖Max HP‖end‖. Harder to detect when HP is above ‖color:gui.green‖50%‖end‖.
infotexts.talentdescription.Touhou_ShenMing02: Healing from medicine +‖color:gui.green‖20%‖end‖; +‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖ ‖color:gui.orange‖debuff resistance‖end‖; +‖color:gui.green‖35%‖end‖ ‖color:gui.orange‖poison resistance‖end‖; debuff duration −‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖.
infotexts.talentdescription.Touhou_ShenMing03: Damage to enemies +‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖. Attacks with ‖color:gui.orange‖magic weapons‖end‖ deal extra ‖color:gui.yellow‖Dream Fade‖end‖ damage, scaling with ‖color:gui.orange‖Magic Ability‖end‖.
infotexts.talentdescription.Touhou_ShenMing04: When HP >‖color:gui.green‖50%‖end‖, +‖color:gui.green‖15%‖end‖ ‖color:gui.orange‖skill levels‖end‖. Wearing ‖color:gui.red‖Kokoro Outfit+‖end‖: bonuses scale with learned emotions: ‖color:gui.green‖11‖end‖: +‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖ ‖color:gui.yellow‖Laceration damage‖end‖ and +‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖ ‖color:gui.yellow‖Laceration resistance‖end‖ ‖color:gui.green‖33‖end‖: +‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖ ‖color:gui.orange‖skill levels‖end‖ ‖color:gui.green‖55‖end‖: −‖color:gui.green‖15%‖end‖ ‖color:gui.orange‖ranged spread‖end‖
infotexts.talentdescription.Touhou_ShenMing05: If a mission ends with no deaths, money gained +‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖. Wearing ‖color:gui.red‖Kokoro Outfit+‖end‖: at mission start gain a ‖color:gui.green‖10‖end‖-minute buff: +‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖ ‖color:gui.orange‖Max HP‖end‖, burn resistance, and all attack damage.
infotexts.talentdescription.Touhou_ShenMing06: Up to ‖color:gui.green‖4‖end‖ times per round, after being attacked gain +‖color:gui.green‖15%‖end‖ ‖color:gui.orange‖burn resistance‖end‖ and ‖color:gui.orange‖Max HP‖end‖ for 1 minute. Wearing ‖color:gui.red‖Kokoro Outfit+‖end‖: grabbing qualifying creatures may teach an extra emotion. If total emotions >‖color:gui.green‖33‖end‖, enhance primary emotion: ‖color:gui.orange‖Joy‖end‖: +‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖ ‖color:gui.yellow‖burn damage‖end‖; ranged shots inflict slight ‖color:gui.yellow‖burn‖end‖ ‖color:gui.orange‖Anger‖end‖: attacks inflict lasting ‖color:gui.yellow‖lacerations‖end‖; magic weapon attacks inflict ‖color:gui.yellow‖slow‖end‖ ‖color:gui.orange‖Sorrow‖end‖: magic melee attacks temporarily reduce enemy attack by ‖color:gui.green‖25%‖end‖ (ranged effect halved) ‖color:gui.orange‖Delight‖end‖: based on average skill levels, +‖color:gui.green‖5%‖end‖ ‖color:gui.orange‖attack damage‖end‖ and move speed (max +‖color:gui.green‖15%‖end‖)
infotexts.talentdescription.Touhou_ShenMing07: Wearing ‖color:gui.red‖Kokoro Outfit+‖end‖: while standing still, ‖color:gui.green‖30%‖end‖ chance to reduce incoming damage by ‖color:gui.green‖30%‖end‖; while walking, ‖color:gui.orange‖ranged spread‖end‖ −‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖; while running, ‖color:gui.orange‖melee damage‖end‖ +‖color:gui.green‖50%‖end‖.
